alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Columbus (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 4:49PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bladen and northeastern Columbus Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 449 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Bladen Community College to Freeman. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elizabethtown, Rowan, Sandyfield, Carvers, Bladen Community College, Abbottsburg, Lisbon, Lagoon, Elkton, Emerson, Council, Kelly, Ruskin, Freeman, White Oak, Delco, Riegelwood, Clarkton, White Lake, and Bolton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
